data.title: Beautiful place to hangout
data.text: We have been invited to a couple of speed painting shows. We have had so much fun.  For a small donation you hangout with upcoming artist and judge there work. At the end you have a opportunity to buy their work via a silent auction. Great d.j's, liquor and laughs.

data.title: Wondeful place for art
data.text: SSSA is a wonderful gallery. Small and cozy and always filled with very interesting and exceptional art from local artists. The staff are very friendly and fun people. The art is always beautiful and diverse. there are often special events held that are exciting and cost friendly. Check it out!
